desktopOnly.label: Desktop Only
desktopOnly.description: Can only be used on desktop/screen width > 768px

pplxPro.label: Perplexity Pro
pplxPro.description: Requires an active Perplexity Pro subscription

experimental.label: Experimental
experimental.description: Experimental plugins. Subject to change or removal without prior notice.

queryboxLanguageModelSelector.title: Language Model Selector
queryboxLanguageModelSelector.description: Enable selection of different language models

queryboxNoFileCreationOnPaste.title: Prevent File Creation on Paste
queryboxNoFileCreationOnPaste.description: Prevent automatic file creation when pasting (very) long text into the query box.

commandMenu.title: Command Menu
commandMenu.description: Quickly navigate around and invoke actions.

threadToc.title: Thread ToC
threadToc.description: Quickly navigate between messages in a thread. Only shows up when there are more than 2 messages.

threadBetterCodeBlocksPreviewMermaid.title: Mermaid Code Blocks Preview
threadBetterCodeBlocksPreviewMermaid.description: Preview mermaid diagrams, simple charts, etc. in code blocks.

threadExportThread.title: Export Thread
threadExportThread.description: Export the current thread in markdown format (with optional citations). More formatting options coming soon.

threadBetterMessageCopyButtons.title: Better Thread Message Copy Buttons
threadBetterMessageCopyButtons.description: Copy message content without citations. More formatting options coming soon.

threadDragAndDropFileToUploadInThread.title: Drag and Drop File(s) to Upload in a thread
threadDragAndDropFileToUploadInThread.description: Treat the whole thread page as a drop zone and allow you to directly drag & drop file(s) to upload them as attachment(s).

threadCollapseEmptyThreadVisualCols.title: Collapse Empty Thread Visual Columns
threadCollapseEmptyThreadVisualCols.description: Collapse empty visual columns in the thread page.

imageGenModelSelector.title: Image Generation Model Selector
imageGenModelSelector.description: Enable selection of different image generation models

onCloudflareTimeoutAutoReload.title: Auto Reload on Cloudflare Timeout
onCloudflareTimeoutAutoReload.description: Auto reload the page on Cloudflare timeout

blockAnalyticEvents.title: Block Analytic Events
blockAnalyticEvents.description: Prevent Perplexity from sending analytic/tracking events. For debugging purposes only.

homeCustomSlogan.title: Custom Home Slogan
homeCustomSlogan.description: Customize the slogan on the home page.
